name: USA.gov
description: As the U.S. government's official web portal, USA.gov makes it easy for the public to get U.S. government information and services on the web. Use our Help page to learn how to accomplish government tasks and access government information and services through USA.gov. We provide software developers and researchers with resources to help people find useful government information. Visit our Developer Resources page to learn more.
